vote.text: Amendment SA 4080 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4080 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S11848; text: CR S11848) To reduce extension to 2 years.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4080 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Voinovich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4080 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
